files.patch:
@@ -1956,0 +1956,5 @@ + *

+ * If two nodes, lets say NodeA and NodeB have same style class "myStyle" and NodeA has + * a pseudo state "myPseudo", then to find NodeA, the lookup method can be used as follows: + * scene.lookup(".myStyle:myPseudo"); or scene.lookup(":myPseudo"); + *

@@ -1971,0 +1976,9 @@ + *

+ * For example, if there are multiple nodes with same style class "myStyle", then the lookupAll method can + * be used to find all these nodes as follows: scene.lookupAll(".myStyle");. + *

+ *

+ * If multiple nodes have same style class "myStyle" and few nodes have + * a pseudo state "myPseudo", then to find all nodes with "myPseudo" state, the lookupAll method can be used as follows: + * scene.lookupAll(".myStyle:myPseudo"); or scene.lookupAll(":myPseudo"); + *
